page.title: 07MONEY TALK SURVEY
page.content: My friend and I did a survey about money.The first question we asked the public was,"do you like the pound coins rather than the pound notes?"We found that twice as many people said they thought the pound coins weren't popular.Some people had to think quite a while before they answered.When we asked people "are you glad the halfpenny's gone,"all 20 people said,"yes".We think they said this because the coins were fiddly and they got caught in ladies' purses. The next question was,"do you think you can lose a pound coin easier than a pound note?"Again, most people said,"yes", even though you can hear them drop. The last question was,"do you like the 20 pence pieces?" Most people said they did. We think so too. By Sarah Rothery & Debbie Short.
